description:
Despite the associations that have become attached to his name, Hattori Hanzo wasn`t actually a ninja himself. But despite that, the fierce Tokugawa samurai from the ninja province of Iga proved to be a force of nature.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Dad`s a Ninja, Hattori Hanzo!
パパは忍者, 服部半蔵!
